citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on July 2,
2025. Family members said licensee was gone and would not be back for several hours. The inspector called the mobile
phone and left a message. The inspector waited 30 minutes and left a written message with family member before leaving
facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on July 2, 
2025. Family members said licensee was gone and would not be back for several hours. The inspector called the mobile 
phone and left a message. The inspector waited 30 minutes and left a written message with family member before leaving 
facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
